articles.content: Meghan McCain made it clear on The View that she is not a fan of the royal family drama. However, the conservative co-host did seem to find some sympathy for Meghan Markle and the abuse she receives … [+3194 chars]

articles.author: Rory Tingle, Eve Buckland
articles.title: Winston Marshall is 'taking time away' from Mumford & Sons after cancel culture row - Daily Mail
articles.description: Winston Marshall was attacked on social media after tweeting support for controversial US journalist Andy Ngo over the weekend, calling him a 'brave man' and hailing his 'important' book.
articles.content: The banjo player from folk rock group Mumford & Sons announced today he is 'taking time away from the band' to 'examine my blindspots' after a Twitter pile-on for praising a controversial right-w… [+10558 chars]
